name: SemiRealisticSpaceGame1
description:
Your objective in this prototype is simple; you must escape the planet's gravity, get past the accelerated asteroid fields and reach the nearby orbiting Moon.

Feedback is greatly appreciated, preferably also answering these two questions -
- How did playing the game make you feel?
- Would you want to play again?

Controls -

W - Upward Thrust
A - Rotate Left
S - Rotate Right
R - Toggle Boosters for more powerful Thrust
M - Toggle Zoom In/Out
SPACE - Restart

Play in fullscreen for the best experience!
